movementSpeed.title: Ground Movement Speed
movementSpeed.tooltip: This changes how quickly Ernesto traces your path when you are in a gravity field, like on a planet.

spaceSpeed.title: Space Acceleration Speed
spaceSpeed.tooltip: This changes how quickly Ernesto accelerates towards you in space.

brambleSpeedMultiplier.title: Dark Bramble Speed Multiplier
brambleSpeedMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase Ernesto's speed in Dark Bramble seeds.

dreamWorldSpeedMultiplier.title: Dream World Speed Multiplier
dreamWorldSpeedMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase Ernesto's speed in the dream world.

startDelay.title: Start Delay
startDelay.tooltip: The time in seconds Ernesto waits before chasing you.
